message: {{#is_alert}} The student mobile app is experiencing a higher than usual number of errors. Check Bugsnag's [timeline](https://app.bugsnag.com/handshake/handshake-ios-student/timeline?filters[event.since][0]=1h&filters[error.status][0]=open) to see what's going wrong. {{/is_alert}} @slack-incidents-students
name: Student iOS App Stability
